full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Overview

This request for proposal (RFP) is limited to holders of Supply Arrangement # E60HN-16ELEC for the procurement of electrical and electronic products.

### Tender Information

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | cb-835-2420181 |
| Amendment Number | 3 |
| Solicitation Number | 2024-00443 |
| Publication Date | 2024-01-31 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-02-15 14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | 2024-02-15 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-02-16 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2024-03-31 |

### Notice Details

* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criterion: Lowest Price

### Request for Proposal

Research and Development for Defence Canada is seeking suppliers of electrical and electronic products. Suppliers must be currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement # E60HN-16ELEC. Interested suppliers can download the solicitation document from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) and submit a response according to the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

The procurement notice is published on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for a period of 15 calendar days. The closing date indicates the duration the notice will be published.

Suppliers already holding a Supply arrangement for electrical and electronic products from Public Works and Government Services Canada who meet the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

### Key Requirements

* Suppliers must be pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement # E60HN-16ELEC
* Suppliers must meet the mandatory technical criteria
* Lowest price will be the selection criterion

### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Vandana Loka
* Email: Vandana.Loka@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (416) 616-2155
* Fax: None
* Notice URL: None
* Attachment: [Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30907/bil_2024-00443.pdf)

Note: Please let me know if you need any modifications or further changes. This is what I aim to recreate from the text you shared.  Let me know if this is acceptable in terms of content quality and formatting.
